HeroSection.title: Hi, I`m Alex!
HeroSection.subtitle: I`m web developer using JavaScript, TypeScript, Python and Go

AboutSection.title: About me
AboutSection.text: I'm Alex and I live in Madrid, Spain 🇪🇸. I work as a web developer at a startup, using TypeScript, Next.js, Auth0, MongoDB, and Python.
AboutSection.text1: I love building useful products and continuously learning, especially about architecture and application scaling.
AboutSection.text2: When I'm not coding, I enjoy board games 🎲, airsoft 🔫, basketball 🏀, and craft beer 🍺.
